summary:
1. Changes all Mastery Perks and some Spells. To make Magic stronger and equal to other fighting styles.
2. Changes all Shouts to make them stronger
3. Skill and Questbook Names, so you an see, what they are.
4. Some small changes
descriptionHtml:
My mods:

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46450/?
]Papa Timm - Archery and Combat[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48963/?
]Papa Timm - Magic & Misc[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52797/?
]Papa Timm - Alchemy and Loot[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54402/?
]Papa Timm - Thievery[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55562/?
]Papa Timm - Enemies and Races[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]


[color=Green][b][size=6][center][i]Papa Timm - Magic and Misc[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]

[size=3][b]In Short[/b][/size]

[b]This mod changes:[/b]

1. Changes all Mastery Perks and some Spells. To make Magic stronger and equal to other fighting styles.
2. Changes all Shouts to make them stronger
3. Skill and Questbook Names, so you an see, what they are.
4. Scrolls are twice as effective as their Spell Brother
5. Dawnbreaker now emits light. Changed the Enchantment
6. Pale Blade is now like a Rune Sword and has the new Meshes and Textures from [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33292/?
]Unique Uniques by InsanitySorrow[/url][/size][/b][/color]
7. A new Mage Home in Whiterun
8. A new designed College Of Winterhold (Archmage Quarters can be used as Playerhome) thanks to some ideas of [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57205/?
]ArchmageQuarters by MrKoekie[/url][/size][/b][/color] and [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36849/?
]Immersive College of Winterhold by Grantyboy050[/url][/size][/b][/color]

[b]This Mod adds:[/b]

1. New Spells in the Destruction Category: Nature Spells
2. Mage Staves with special Abilities: Fire, Frost, Shock, Nature, Sun
3. Force Powers ala Star Wars with 4 New Perks in Alteration and many Spells divided in Dark Light and Neutral; new Enemies and new Robes (with old Meshes and textures)
4. Inscription revival! Adds Crafting Stations to Dragonsreach; Winterhold Arcanaeum; Riften and Solitude; The Stations are: Ink Lab (For Ink :-), Scribe's Desk (for Scrolls); Scribe's Lectern (For Spell Tomes)
5. Rune Swords: They gave up light and the enchentment power grows with the Destruction Mastery Perks you have. Blocking activates Ward. The Ward levels with the Restauration Mastery Perks.
6. New Apprentice Beam Spells, inspired from [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51335/?
]Beam Spells Vanilla Dragonborn Dawguard by JosephB1234[/url][/size][/b][/color]
7. JosephB1234 was so kind to make an Art for the Nature Spells. Now you will not see a shock symbol but a green nature Symbole. I am thrilled, that someone made an extra nif for my mod!!!!
8. Defensive Staves have been added! Thanks to [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22691/?]Staves of Skyrim by Kearsage [/url][/size][/b][/color]
Read mor under Point 07. Mage Staves
9. Mounts (Wolf, Bear, Spider, Panthor, Sabrecat) thanks to [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/?
]Armored SabreCat Mount by tumbajamba[/url][/size][/b][/color]
[color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12700/?]Mikes Mystical Mounts by Mike[/url][/size][/b][/color]
10. [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48315/?
]Wind Destruction Magic by reaperix[/url][/size][/b][/color] added to the Nature Spell Category
11. A new Mage Home (Not jet perfect, but works without bugs) accessible over Breezehome (I will find a better place. Have you ideas?

[color=Green][b][size=3]Good to know[/size][/b][/color]

- My main Mod [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46450/?
]Papa Timm - Archery and Combat[/url][/size][/b][/color] goes very well with this Mod. I play with many mods, that make the game harder. So I needed some things, that make me harder to. Of course my module can be used without any other mod from me.

- I know I remade [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4374/?
]Better Magic by sushisquid [/url][/size][/b][/color]. I did it, because I wanted it to go well with other mods. For Example with some other Magic changing mods and Natural Spells. I decided to do it myself. So I use only 1 ESP and not 8 or 9 I used for the same thing before.

- I know, I remade [color=green][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14353/?
]Improved Dragon Shouts by Ozram[/url][/size][/b][/color]. I did it because I wanted to minimize my ESPs. I integrated all into one. I also changed some things, I wanted to have.

- And of course I know, I some kind of remade [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35361/?]Nature Spell Pack by cansit[/url][/size][/b][/color]. This I did, because I love it and I wanted the Natural Spell System for my Magic Staves and RuneSwords. Of course also for my Idea of a Spell Sword.

-Special thanks to [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1607183/?
]Etayorius[/url][/size][/b][/color]. Without him my mods would not exist. And my description would be without colour and everything else.


[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]01.Prolog – 02.Casting Time[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]03.Changed Perks – 04.New Perks[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]05.Changed Spells – 06.New Spells[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]07.Mage Staves – 08.Rune Swords[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]09.Setting Changes – 10.Shouts[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]11.The Force[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]12.Small Things – 13.Books[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]14.Installation – 15.Compatibility[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]16.Credits[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]



[color=green][b][size=3]01.Prolog[/size][/b][/color]

At first I want to thank all the Modders, who helped me and let me use their Ideas, Meshes and Textures. I am really bad in designing. So I asked many many people, whether I could use their work. Most of them said yes. Without them, my mod would be less than nothing.

Every Single new Texture, every single new Mesh and every single new Animation is not from me but from other great modders. I included them into my mod, so you do not have to install their mods. You should of course download them, to endorse them afterwards.

This Mod does not use any SCRIPTS.


[b][color=yellow]Papa Timm - Magic and Misc[/b][/color]

This mod does everything Better Magic does. I just let the Necromancer Perk in peace. You can of course download this mod instead:
[color=green][b][size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4374/?
]Better Magic by sushisquid [/url][/size][/b][/color]
Also this mod itegrates most things of [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35361/?
]Nature Spell Pack by cansit[/url][/size][/b][/color]
I only changed the Nature Atronach to a Wolf or with Perk to a Sabre Cat. And I had not the possibility to make the Armor, cansit made. If you prefere the better Version of cansit, you should use his instead.

[b]2. shortened casting time of all Destruction spells:[/b]
- All [color=yellow]one-handed spells[/color] that had casting times of 0.5 sec, now have casting times of 0.2 sec.
- The [color=yellow]two-handed spells[/color] that had casting time of 3 seconds, now have casting time of 1 second.

[b]3. Changed Perks[/b]
- [color=yellow]Every mastery perk[/color] (novice, apprentice, adept, expert, master) in all five spell schools does not only half the costs. For alteration, conjuration, and illusion, each perk increases the duration of spells in that school by 15%. For destruction and restoration, each perk increases the magnitude of spells in that school by 15%.

- [color=yellow]Mage Armor Perks[/color]:
1. Perk - 2x Duration and Magnitude of Armor Spells; If wearing no armor you gain 50 Points of Armor
2. Perk - 2,5 x Duration and Magnitude of Armor Spells; If wearing no armor you gain 100 Points of Armor
3. Perk - 3x Duration and Magnitude of Armor Spells; If wearing no armor you gain 150 Points of Armor

-[color=yellow] The Augmented Element Perks[/color] add 20% damage per rank, not 25%, They also add 15% resistance to that element with each rank.

-[color=yellow]Intense Flames, Deep Freeze and Disintegrate[/color]:
1. Intense Flames and Deep Freeze: When the Target has less than 50% Health, there is a chance of 20% to trigger their effect.
2. Disintegrate: When the Target has less than 50% Health, there is a chance of 15% to trigger their effect.
3. Flames, Frostbite, Sparks, Cloaks and Walls can not trigger their effect anymore.
4. Blizzard and Firestorm trigger always their Effect when the Target is under 50% Health
5. Lightning Storm triggers with a chance of 40%, when the Target is under 50% Health

[b]4. New Perks[/b]

-[color=yellow]Augmented Nature[/color]:
Perk 1: Nature Spells do 20% more Damage and you resist 15% of nature damage.
Perk 2: Nature Spells do 40% more Damage and you resist 30% of nature damage.

-[color=yellow]Skeleton Weave[/color]:
Every Nature Spell lets grow an Weave around any Creature. This weave destroys every Skeleton very fast, and slows every creature down to 50%.

-[color=yellow]Nature Enchanter[/color]:
Nature Enchantments on weapons are 25% stronger.

-[color=yellow]Spellsword:[/color]
Equipped an One-Handed Weapon in one Hand and a Spell in the other;
- Fire, Frost, Shock, Healing or Nature Spell equipped: 15% Chance to apply Combat Hit Spell

-[color=yellow]Arcane Arrows[/color]:
You find it under the Conjuration Tree.
- You can summon Arcane Arrows. Arcane and Bound Arrows damage scales with all your Magic Skills.

-[color=yellow]Arcane Archer[/color]:
You find it under the Destruction Tree.
- You gain the old wisdom of Magic Arrow Forging. Those Arrows can do special magic damage, which scales with your Destruction Mastery Perks.

- [color=green]Destruction Perk[/color]
____[color=yellow][b]Novice[/b][/color]; __[color=yellow][b]Apprentice[/b][/color]; ___[color=yellow][b]Adept[/b][/color]; ___[color=yellow][b]Expert[/b][/color]; ____[color=yellow][b]Master[/b][/color]
- Fire: 10 Damage; 20 Damage; 40 Damage; 60 Damage; 80 Damage;
- Ice: 05 Damage; 10 Damage; 20 Damage; 30 Damage; 40 Damage;
- Shock: 05 Damage; 10 Damage; 20 Damage; 30 Damage; 40 Damage;
-Nature: 05 Damage; 10 Damage; 20 Damage; 30 Damage; 40 Damage;

- [color=Green][b]Restoration Perk[/b][/color]
_______[color=yellow][b]Novice[/b][/color]; ___[color=yellow][b]Apprentice[/b][/color]; ___[color=yellow][b]Adept[/b][/color]; __[color=yellow][b]Expert[/b][/color]; __[color=yellow][b]Master[/b][/color]
- [color=green][b]Heal:[/b][/color] 10 Damage; 20 Damage; 40 Damage; 60 Damage; 80 Damage;

-[color=yellow]In the Blocking Tree[/color]:

1. [color=green]Real Mage[/color]: Casting cost of all Spells is reduced by <25>% and magicka regeneration is increased by <25>% when holding a Defensive Staff.

2. [color=green]Magic Cloak[/color]: Blocking with Mage Staves creates a Cloak, that fits to its magic powers.

3. [color=green]Warding[/color]: Rune Swords ward, while blocking (Lesser Ward). Defensive Staves ward, while Blocking (Greater Ward). Warding gets stronger with the Regeneration Master Perks.

4. [color=green]Kinetics[/color]:
Bashing with a Rune Sword drains magicka. Bashing with a Mage Staff does an effect, that fits to its magic powers.
Bashing with a Defensive Staff, throws you foes away.

[b]5. Changed Spells[/b]

Rune Spells
- [color=red]Fire Rune[/color]: also staggers and benefit from Augmented Fire Perk
- [color=blue]Frost Rune[/color]: also slows down and benefit from Augmented Frost Perk
- [color=purple]Shock Rune[/color]: also Paralyses and benefit from Augmented Shock Perk
Destruction Spells
- [color=red]Fireball[/color]: Hits everything in the area ignoring obstacles.
- [color=blue]Ice Storm[/color]: Fires through obstacles.
- [color=purple]Chain Lightning[/color]: better in groups and it hits only hostiles.
Alteration Spells
- [color=yellow]Cloak Spells:[/color] Range dropped from 10 to 8; Mastery Perks effect Magnitude
- [color=yellow]Paralyse:[/color] Duration from 10 to 7; - [color=yellow]Mass Paralyse:[/color] Duration from 15 to 10; Dual Casting is possible
- [color=yellow]Dragonhide[/color]: is a normal armor Spell; + 150 Armor for 60 Sec
- [color=yellow]Ward Spells[/color]: Halfed the Cost
Illusion Spells:
- [color=purple]Invisibility[/color]: Now muffles you for 30 Seconds too.


[b]6. New Spells[/b]
- Silentium: Silences the Target. The higher the Illusion Skill, the longer it lasts.
- Ethereal: You become invulnerable, but unable to attack. However you recover magicka and stamina.
- [color=green]Nature Spells[/color]:
Novice
1. [color=yellow]Leaves[/color]: A swarm that does <mag> poison damage for <dur> seconds.
2. [color=yellow]Gust[/color]: A burst of wind that does <mag> points of damage per second to Health. Targets hit with this spell have a chance to be flung away.
Apprentice
1. [color=yellow]Poisoned Thorn[/color]: A Poisoned Thorn, that does <mag> points of Damage and poisones the Target for 5 Seconds.
2. [color=yellow]Wind Bolt[/color]: A burst of air that does <mag> points of wind damage to Health. Targets hit with this spell have a chance to be flung away.
3. [color=yellow]Wind Rune[/color]: Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes for <mag> points of wind damage when enemies come near. Targets hit with this spell have a chance to be flung away.
4. [color=yellow]Nature Summon[/color]: Summons a Wolf/Sabre Cat for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
Adept
1. [color=yellow]Whirlwind[/color]: A whirlwind, that draws the targets Stamina by <mag> Points. It Pushes the Target away.
2. [color=yellow]Whirlwind Cloak[/color]: For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range have a chance of being flung away.
3. [color=yellow]Weaves[/color]: Do <mag> points of Stamina Damage for <dur>. You can block enemies with weaves of Thorns.
4. [color=yellow]Tornado[/color]: A fierce cyclone that does <mag> points of wind damage to Health in a 10 foot radius. Targets hit with this spell have a chance to be flung away.
Expert
1. [color=yellow]Explosive Thorn[/color]: A nature explosion for <mag> points of damage in a 15 foot radius.
2. [color=yellow]Tempest[/color]: A burst of air that does <mag> points of wind damage to Health. Targets hit with this spell have a chance to be flung away.
3. [color=yellow]Wall Of Wind[/color]: Sprayed on the ground, it creates a wall of wind that does <50> points of wind damage per second. Targets hit with this spell have a chance to be flung away.
Master
1. [color=yellow]Nature Burst[/color]: A Burst of Nature, that damages all foes around the caster <mag> points and poisones them.
2. [color=yellow]Cyclone[/color]: A fierce cyclone that does <mag> points of wind damage to Health in a 15 foot radius. Targets hit with this spell have a chance to be flung away.

- [color=green] Ray Spells[/color]:
Apprentice
1. [color=yellow]Fire Ray[/color]: A ray of Fire that does <mag> points of damage per second. Target on fire take extra damage.
2. [color=yellow]Frost Ray[/color]: A ray of cold that does <mag> points of damage per second to Health and Stamina.
3. [color=yellow]Shock Ray[/color]: A ray of Lightning that does <mag> points of shock damage to Health and Magicka per second.
4. [color=yellow]Nature Ray[/color]: A ray of Nature Power that does <mag> poison damage for <dur> seconds.
5. [color=yellow]Sun Ray[/color]: A ray of Sunlight that does <mag> points of damage per cecond to undead.
6. [color=yellow]Paralyze Ray[/color]: Targets that fail to resist are paralyzed as long as the Ray is casted on them.
7. [color=yellow]Calm Ray[/color]: A ray that makes creatures and people up to level <mag> not fight as long as the spell is casted on them.
8. [color=yellow]Fury Ray[/color]: A ray that makes creatures and people up to level <mag> flee from combat as long as the spell is casted on them.
9. [color=yellow]Heal Ray[/color]: Creates a beam that heals the target <mag> points per second, but not undead, atronachs or machines.

- [color=green]Mount Spells[/color]:

1. [color=yellow]Wolf Mounts[/color]: Summons a Wolf Mount for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
Black, Brown, White and Armored

2. [color=yellow]Sabrecat Mounts[/color]: Summons a Sabre Cat for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
Brown, White and Panthor/Panthor Armored (He is purple and can only optained by killing Keldor or Evil - Lyn)

3. [color=yellow]Bear Mount[/color]: Summons a Bear Mount for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
Black, Brown and White

4. [color=yellow]Spider Mount[/color]: Summons a Frostbite Spider Mount for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
Brown and White (You can find the Spells on a Big Spider near Riften)

Every Spell can be crafted on the Inscription Desk (not Panthor)
Every Spell can be bought from Mages (Not Panthor or the Spiders)

[b]7. Mage Staves:[/b]
There are 2 forms of Mage Staves

1. [color=yellow]Mage Staff 2 Handed[/color]

- [color=Green]Attacking:[/color] With a chance of [b]100%[/b] do [color=red]Fire[/color], [color=blue] Frost[/color], [color=purple]Shock[/color] or [color=purple]Nature[/color] Damage. The Damage scales with your Destruction Perks you have.
- [color=Green]Bashing:[/color]
*[color=red]Fire:[/color] Incinerate with Stagger Effect, that does Fire damage which is scalling with the Master Perks in Destruction
*[color=blue]Frost:[/color] Ice Form for 7sec, that does Frost damage which is scalling with the Master Perks in Destruction
*[color=purple]Shock:[/color] Push Back and does Shock damage which is scalling with the Master Perks in Destruction (Chance: 50%)
*[color=grey]Sun:[/color] Turn Undead for 5sec, that scales with your Restauration Master Perks
*[color=green]Nature:[/color] A weave destroying Skeletons or slowing down creatures.

2. [color=yellow]Defesive Mage Staff[/color]

They akt like shields and have a light with them, that never vanishes. Bashing has a chance to paralyse the target and Power bashing has a chance to push the enemy away.
I made 3 sorts of Defensive Staves

1. Defensive Staff: Has very low armor rating and is listed as clothing

2. Defensive Staff - Light: Has stronger Armor rating and is listed as Light Armor

3. Defensive Staff - Warstaff: Has the strongest Armor Rating and is listes as Heavy armor


[b]8. Rune Swords:[/b]
with the fantastik Meshes of [color=green][b][size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42300/?
]Rune Swords for the Battlemage by HXP[/url][/size][/b][/color]

- [color=Green]Attacking:[/color] With a chance of [b]100%[/b] do [color=red]Fire[/color], [color=blue] Frost[/color], [color=purple]Shock[/color] or [color=green]Nature[/color] Damage. The Damage scales with your Destruction Perks you have.

- [color=Green]Bashing:[/color]
*[color=red]Absorb Mana[/color] Absorbs Mana with Stagger Effect (Chance 50%)

Weapons you can find in the World: I also added Weapons from
[color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13665/?
]Gizmodian Oblivion Weapons for Skyrim by Gizmodian [/url][/size][/b][/color]

Rune Swords do only half enchantment damage than Battle Mage Staves.
They are all handed as Rune Swords. They can not be forged. You have to find them in the World.


[b]9. Settings Changed[/b]
- Dual casting costs 2,5x and gives 2,5x Duration/Magnitude
- Magica Regenerates in Battle 2x faster
- Doubled the Magic Ward Power

[b]10. Shouts[/b]

You can get a better mod for that from [color=green][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14353/?
]Improved Dragon Shouts by Ozram[/url][/size][/b][/color]
My mod is a bit stronger and all in one ESP.

- [color=Green]Dragon Shouts[/color]

[color=yellow]Animal Allegiance[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl20 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 30sec->120sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 50sec->35sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl35 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 45sec->150sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 60sec->52sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl50 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->180sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 70sec->70sec

[color=yellow]Aura Whisper[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl20 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 10sec->6sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 30sec->10sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl35 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 20sec->9sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 40sec->12sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl50 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 30sec->12sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 50sec->15sec

[color=yellow]Become Ethereal[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 8sec->10sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 30sec->15sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 13sec->15sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 40sec->20sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 18sec->20sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 50sec->25sec

[color=yellow]Call Dragon[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 5sec->5sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 5sec->5sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 300sec->180sec

[color=yellow]Call of Valor[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->120sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 180sec->120sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->120sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 180sec->120sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->120sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 180sec->120sec

[color=yellow]Clear Skies[/color]
No changes!

[color=yellow]Disarm[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] 12->25 [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 30sec->15sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] 25->40 [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 35sec->20sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] 35->55 [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 40sec->25sec

[color=yellow]Dismay[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] 7->15 [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 40sec->20sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] 15->30 [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 45sec->30sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] 24->45 [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 50sec->40sec

[color=yellow]Dragon Rend[/color]
No changes!

[color=yellow]Elemental Fury[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 15sec->15sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 30sec->20sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 15sec->17sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 40sec->30sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 15sec->20sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 50sec->40sec

[color=yellow]Ice Form[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 2/sec->6/sec [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 15sec->15sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 60sec->35sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 2/sec->8/sec [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 30sec->20sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 90sec->52sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 2/sec->10/sec [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->30sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 120sec->70sec

[color=yellow]Kyne's Peace[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl20 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->120sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 40sec->20sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl35 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 120sec->150sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 50sec->30sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Maxlvl:[/color] lvl20->lvl50 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 180sec->180sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 60sec->40sec

[color=yellow]Marked for Death[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 1/sec->3/sec [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->120sec [color=Blue] Armor:[/color] -25->-50
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 2/sec->4/sec [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->150sec [color=Blue] Armor:[/color] -50->-100
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 3/sec->5/sec [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->180sec [color=Blue] Armor:[/color] -75->-140


[color=yellow]Slow Time[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Slow:[/color] 70%->60% [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 8sec->10sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Slow:[/color] 80%->70% [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 12sec->15sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Slow:[/color] 90%->80% [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 16sec->20sec

[color=yellow]Storm Call[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 40->45 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->120sec [color=Blue] Cd:[/color] 300sec->240sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 60->70 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 60sec->150sec [color=Blue] Cd:[/color] 480sec->300sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 80->95 [color=Blue]Dur:[/color] 180sec->180sec [color=Blue] Cd:[/color] 600sec->360sec

[color=yellow]Throw Voice[/color]
No changes!

[color=yellow]Whirlwind Sprint[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 20sec->10sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 25sec->12sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 35sec->15sec

- [color=Green]Dawnguard Dragon Shouts[/color]

[color=yellow]Drain Vitality[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Dam to Stam;Mag;Health:[/color] 5-0-0/sec->6-0-0/sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 30sec->30sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Dam to Stam;Mag;Health:[/color] 5-5-0/sec->8-8-0/sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 60sec->50sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Dam to Stam;Mag;Health:[/color] 5-5-5/sec->10-10-10/sec [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 90sec->70sec

Absorb effect added!!! Now you regain as much Stamina, Magicka & Health as the enemies lose.

[color=yellow]Soul Tear[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 5sec->5sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 5sec->5sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 90sec->70sec

[color=yellow]Summon Durnehviir[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 5sec->5sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 5sec->5sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 300sec->180sec

- [color=Green]Dragonborn Dragon Shouts[/color]

[color=yellow]Battle Fury[/color]
No changes!

[color=yellow]Bend Will[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 5sec->5sec
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 90sec->70sec
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Cd:[/color] 120sec->90sec

[color=yellow]Cyclone[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 50->100
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 75->150
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]Dam:[/color] 100->200

[color=yellow]Dragon Aspect[/color]

Lvl 1: [color=Blue]PowerAttack Bonus:[/color] 25%->50% [color=Blue]Armor:[/color] 25->50 [color=Blue]Fire&Frost Resist:[/color] 0%->0%
Lvl 2: [color=Blue]PowerAttack Bonus:[/color] 25%->75% [color=Blue]Armor:[/color] 100->125 [color=Blue]Fire&Frost Resist:[/color] 25%->25%
Lvl 3: [color=Blue]PowerAttack Bonus:[/color] 25%->100% [color=Blue]Armor:[/color]100->175 [color=Blue]Fire&Frost Resist:[/color] 25%->35%



- [color=Green]Black Book Epistolary Acumen Shout Abilities[/color]

[color=yellow]Dragonborn Force[/color]

- Your Unrelenting Force shout does more damage and using all three words may disintegrate enemies.
NEW: Your Voice is so strong that not only pushes your enemies, it may disarm them too; Damage increase is only if three words are used, it doubles shout damage. Disintegrate was deactivated.

[color=yellow]Dragonborn Flame[/color]

- When your Fire Breath Shout kills an enemy, a fire wyrm emerges from their corpse to fight for you for 60 seconds.

Now combines Fire Breath with Dismay (values are the same as described in shouts except fear lasts only for the ignite duration (can be increase via The Fire Within). Fire Wyrms are a bit useless, but I left them for the fun.

[color=yellow]Dragonborn Frost[/color]

- Your Frost Breath Shout encases foes in ice for (15/15/15->15/20/30) seconds.

Combines Frost Breath with Ice Form. Increased Ice Form duration depending on Shout level.


- [color=Green]Word Meditation Shouts Abilities[/color]

[color=yellow]Fus: Force Without Effort[/color]
- You stagger 25% less and foes stagger 25% more. (Augments power attacks and Unrelenting Force shout.)

[color=yellow]Feim: Eternal Spirit[/color]
- While Ethereal, you recover health (25%->200%) faster. (Only active and visible on Active Effects menu when using Become Ethereal shout.)

[color=yellow]Yol: The Fire Within[/color]
- Fire Breath shout (deals 25% more damage -> ignite lasts 50% longer).

[color=Green]11. The Force[/color]

You can find the Forces in chests, spread out in the World. The first one you can find behind the Guardian Stones.
Also I added Robes, Hoods, Boots and Bracers for the Dark Side and The Light Side.
Sorry for that. I just love the idea and I love to find all the Holocrons with the forces.
I added also some NPCs called 1. Je'daii 2. Siit
The Idea came from [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24585/?
]The Way of the Force a la Star Wars by SephDragoon [/url][/size][/b][/color]

If you want to find the Forces very fast, you may read the Book I placed under Farengars bed. There is a description, where to find all the Holocrons.


[color=blue]The Neutral Side[/color]

- [color=yellow]Blindness[/color]: Blind everyone around you and staggers enemies.
- [color=yellow]Mind Trick[/color]: Persuade others easier with a <mag> higher Speech Skill for <dur>.
- [color=yellow]Projection[/color]: You project a small light and sound at a target location in order to cause enemies to investigate that location.
- [color=yellow]Battle Meditation[/color]: Regenerate Magicka <mag>% faster. Regenerate Stamina <mag>% faster.
- [color=yellow]Meditation[/color]: Meditation increases your magicka regeneration rate by <mag> for <dur> sec.. While meditating you move <mag> slower for <dur>.
- [color=yellow]Push[/color]
Light Side: 25% chance to disarm the Target.
Dark Side: Pushing does 40 extra Damage.
- [color=yellow]Wave[/color]: A wave of pure Force, that staggers and throws enemies away. Does 20 extra Damage.
Light Side: 25% chance to disarm the Target.
Dark Side: Pushing does 40 extra Damage.
- [color=yellow]Telekinesis[/color]: Use The Force to pull objects to you.
- [color=yellow]Speed[/color]: Increases your attack speed for <dur> seconds. Increases your running speed by <dur> seconds.
- [color=yellow]Conjure Force Ghost[/color]
Light Side: Summons a Jed'aii Ghost to help you.
Dark Side: Summons a Siit to destroy your enemies.

[color=green]The Light Side[/color]

- [color=yellow]Purify / Purify Others[/color]: Cures Disease and Poison.
Light Side: Resist <mag>% of poison for <dur> seconds.
- [color=yellow]Heal / Heal Others[/color]: Heals the caster <mag> points every second for <dur> seconds.
Light Side: You absorb 85% of all Dark Forces for <dur>.
- [color=yellow]Calmed[/color]: With the chance of 25% creatures and people won't fight for <dur> seconds.
Light Side: Target won't flee for <dur> seconds and gets some extra health and stamina.
- [color=yellow]Protection[/color]: Full body ward absorbs <mag> points of damage. You resist physical Damage for <mag>%.
Light Side: Resist <mag>% of magic for <dur> seconds.
- [color=yellow]Slow[/color]: Target is slowed by <mag>% for <dur> seconds. Drain the target's Stamina by <mag> points.
Light Side: Drains <mag> points of magicka.
- [color=yellow]Repulse[/color]: Throws a wave of force energy out from yourself, that pushes back all enemies.
Light Side: Lowers the magic resistance of surrounding enemies by <mag> points for <dur>.

[color=red]The Dark Side[/color]

- [color=yellow]Grip[/color]: Pulls a living creature to you from a distance. Damages for <mag> points of health and Stamina.
Dark Side: Damages magicka half as much.
- [color=yellow]Lightning[/color]: Lightning that does <mag> points of damage to Health and half Magicka per second. If the target is within close range, they will also be staggered.
Dark Side: Chain Lightning with <mag> points of damage,
- [color=yellow]Corruption[/color]: With a chance of 25% creatures and people flee from combat for <dur> sec.
Dark Side: Fowes will attack anything nearby for <dur> sec (Chance 25%).
- [color=yellow]Kinetite[/color]: A Ball of kinetic energy dealing <mag> stamina damage and half health damage.
Dark Side: Does <mag> points of extra damage.
- [color=yellow]Stun[/color]: Targets that fail to resist are paralyzed for <dur> seconds.
Dark Side: Targets that fail to resist are paralyzed for <dur> seconds.

Most Force Powers get extra effects when you have either the Light Side Perk or the Dark Side Perk.
There are 4 Perks
[color=red]Dark Side Perk[/color]: Dark Side Force is 25% stronger. Light Side Force is 25% weaker.
[color=green]Light Side Perk[/color]: Dark Side Force is 25% Weaker. Light Side Force is 25% stronger.
[color=blue]Neutral Side Perk[/color]: Neutral Force is 25% stronger. Meditation Power.
[color=yellow]Evade Arrows[/color]: You can evade 50 % of all Arrows shoot at you.


In addition my Mod changes some small things:

[b]12. Small Things[/b]
- Smelter and Tanning Rack give Points for Smithing
- Cooking Pot gives Points for Alchemie
- The Shrines giving the boost not for 8h game time but for 24 hours real time
- Pickaxe and Woodcutters Axe have now a weight of 5 each (from 10)
- Vaermina Robes have now an enchantment of Fortifying Magicka Regenertion Rate from 80 % They are now Light Armor (from Heavy)
- Dart Traps are deadlier

[b]13. Books and Scrolls[/b]

- Scrolls now are 2x stronger than Spells

- [color=yellow]Inscription[/color]

Do you remember that mod, named „Inscription“ by Buckles?
There you could make Scrolls and Spell Tomes in special Crafting stations.
You needed paper, that you get from old Books and you needed Ink to write.
The Ink you could make from a Ink crafting station.

I used this mod a long time ago and then it vanished. Now I made a remake of it.
The crafting stations are in the room in Dragonsreach. Also in the Blue Palace in Solitude. Further in the Arcanaeum i nWinterhold and in Riften.

By now you can craft nearly all Spell Tomes from all 3 DLCs. Also the ones, which are not in game (e.g. Fade Others).
Also you may craft all Scrolls, including Scrolls from Quests or Quest Rewards.
An Ingame Book will explain more.
A new Soul Fountain was added to the same Towns. It allows you to merge 3 small Soul Gems to 1 Higher ranked one.

If you wish to implement your own Mage Books, you may use the Keywords for the Crafting station, which are explained under Compatibility.

- Following Books have now a (quest) (Skill) or (Map) in there Names so you can find out, which book increases e.g. your Pickpocket.
Those Books have raised Prices.

All Skill Books
Legend Of Red Eagle
Explorer Guide to Skyrim
Lost Legends
Boethiah's Proving

[b]14. Installation[/b]

[b][color=yellow]Install[/b][/color]
1.Extract file
2.Copy 01PapaTimm-Magic&Misc.esp, 01PapaTimm-Magic&Misc.bsa in your Skyrim\Data
3.Open the Skyrim launcher / Nexus Mod Manager and check all PapaTimm.esp files


[b][color=yellow]Uninstall[/b][/color]

[b]1.[/b] Delete all PapaTimm-files.bsa
[b]2.[/b] Delete all PapaTimm-files.esp

[b]15. Compatibility[/b]


This mod is not compatible with mods, that change
- Destructions Perk Tree and the following Perks: All Augmented Perks
- All Mastery Perks (Novice,Apprentice,Adept,Expert,Master) fom all Schools
- Aspekt Of Terror Perk
- Twin Souls Perk
- Mage Armor 1,2,3 Perk
- most of the Spells
- Leveled Lists of Staff, Scroll, Sell Tomes
- College Of Winterhold and its Lighning.


[color=red][b]Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonborn will be required! [/b][/color]
[color=red][b]*[/b][/color] If the game ctds at the beginning, than you have to buy all the DLC
[color=red][b]*[/b][/color] If you are playing this game for not so long you bought the Legendary Edition and have all the DLC already.
[color=red][b]*[/b][/color] If you are playing this game for a long time, it deserves you buy all the DLC.


[color=green][b]Make your Mod Compatible:[/b][/color]

In the game there are so many Keywords programed but not used. I used some of them.
Add those Keywords to your Weapon, Spell or Recipe to make your mod compatible.

[b]Bows and Arrows[/b]
Long Bows Keyword: -
Long Arrow Keyword: TraitPowerHungry
Short Bow Keyword: JobFletcher
Short Arrows Keyword: TraitGreedy

[b]Weapons[/b]
[color=grey]QuicksilverWeapons[/color] Keyword: JobOrcChief
WitchHunterWeapons Keyword: JobMinstrel
[color=red]Skyforge Steel / Blades Weapons / Dark Elven Weapons[/color] Keyword: MagicRestedMagicka
[color=yellow]Throwing Weapons / One Handed Crossbows[/color] Keyword: MothNest2

[color=white]Silent Moons Weapons[/color] Keyword: Job Apothecary
[color=red]Mage Staff Fire[/color] Keyword: JobCourtWizard
[color=orange]Mage Staff Sun[/color] Keyword: JobLumberjack
[color=blue]Mage Staff Ice[/color] Keyword: BookShelfFirstBook
[color=purple]Mage Staff Lightning[/color] Keyword: BookShelfLastBook
[color=green]Mage Staff Nature[/color] Keyword: MothNest1


[b]Spells[/b]
[color=green]Nature Spell[/color] Keyword: MagicRestedStamina
[color=yellow]Destruction Concentration Spell[/color] Keyword: BookShelfClickTrigger

[b]Crafting Stations[/b]
[color=green]Crafting Ink Station[/color] Keyword: DLC1WispWallWisp1
[color=green]Crafting Scroll Station[/color] Keyword: DLC1WispWallWisp2
[color=green]Crafting Spell Tome Station[/color] Keyword: DLC1WispWallWisp3
[color=green]Crafting Skooma Lab[/color] Keyword: CraftTypeCookPot
[color=silver]Silent Moons Forge[/color] Keyword: DLC1WispWallEffect
[color=silver]Nightingale Crafting Station[/color] Keyword: TGValuable
[color=silver]Jewlery Crafting[/color] Keyword: JobOrcChief
[color=silver]Special Crafting[/color] Keyword: JobLumberjack

author: James_T_G

files.name: Papa Timm - Magic and Misc
files.changelogHtml:
I could add the meshes and textures of cansit's mod "Nature Spell Pack". He answered my request positive. Thanks again!
Added Druid Hood, Gloves and Boots with extra enchantment; Changed the Projectile of Explosive Thorn; added "Conjure Nature Atronach" Spell;
Changed some other things and bugged some fixes...

files.name: Papa Timm - Magic and Misc
files.changelogHtml:
New Meshes and Textures for the Player Home. Some changes too.
I made the first changes to the college of winterhold. Archmage Quarters look nicer and are a player home. Some lightning changes too.

files.name: Compatibility Mage College Mods
files.changelogHtml:
New Meshes and Textures for the Player Home. Some changes too.
I made the first changes to the college of winterhold. Archmage Quarters look nicer and are a player home. Some lightning changes too.
